Finishing Thunder.name: Finishing Thunder
Finishing Thunder.fullText:
Building Thunder Attack 11Finishing Thunder

You attack, then release a thundering shout that blasts injured enemies.

Encounter        Primal, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each bloodied enemy in the blast takes 5 + your Constitution modifier thunder damage.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 26.
Finishing Thunder.flavor: You attack, then release a thundering shout that blasts injured enemies.
Finishing Thunder.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each bloodied enemy in the blast takes 5 + your Constitution modifier thunder damage.

Storm Dragon Rage.name: Storm Dragon Rage
Storm Dragon Rage.fullText:
Building Thunder Attack 20Storm Dragon Rage

Lightning arcs from your weapon as you fly against those that defy the storm.

Daily        Lightning, Primal, Rage, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning and thunder damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast, other than the target, is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You enter the rage of the storm dragon. Until the rage ends, once per round when you hit with an at-will attack power, you deal 1[W] lightning and thunder damage to each enemy within 3 squares of you. In addition, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you must land at the end of your turn when you fly using this rage.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 26.
Storm Dragon Rage.flavor: Lightning arcs from your weapon as you fly against those that defy the storm.
Storm Dragon Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning and thunder damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast, other than the target, is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Storm Dragon Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the storm dragon. Until the rage ends, once per round when you hit with an at-will attack power, you deal 1[W] lightning and thunder damage to each enemy within 3 squares of you. In addition, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you must land at the end of your turn when you fly using this rage.

Storm Gathering.name: Storm Gathering
Storm Gathering.fullText:
Building Thunder Utility 12Storm Gathering

Through sheer force of will, you turn the fatigue of the day’s battles to your advantage.

Encounter        Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your attacks deal extra thunder damage equal to the number of healing surges you have spent since your last extended rest.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 26.
Storm Gathering.flavor: Through sheer force of will, you turn the fatigue of the day’s battles to your advantage.
Storm Gathering.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your attacks deal extra thunder damage equal to the number of healing surges you have spent since your last extended rest.
